column4: in short, using du, I cannot find any files that I do not already know exist. Yet somehow, there are 250+ ! gigabytes! that are somewhere on the disk, that I cannot find
when I do find or du, I do sometimes see a line that looks like this: find: /proc/13731/task/13731/fdinfo/5: No such file or directory
I am not sure if that matters
thers scripts/cli and gui tools to show whats using space.. if you want to hit google.. i dont use them much.
